author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Sujato Bhikkhu

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Venerable Anuruddha went up to the Buddha … and said to him:

segments.pli: “idhāhaṃ, bhante, mātugāmaṃ passāmi dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantaṃ.
segments.en: “Sometimes, sir, with my clairvoyance that’s purified and superhuman, I see that a female—when her body breaks up, after death—is reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Katīhi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti?
segments.en: How many qualities do females have so that they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”

segments.pli: “Pañcahi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
segments.en: “Anuruddha, when females have five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.

segments.pli: Saddho ca hoti, hirimā ca hoti, ottappī ca hoti, akkodhano ca hoti, paññavā ca hoti—
segments.en: They’re faithful, conscientious, prudent, free of anger, and wise.

segments.pli: imehi kho, anuruddha, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti.
segments.en: When females have these five qualities, when their body breaks up, after death, they are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

sections.title: Then Venerable Anuruddha went up to the Buddha ……

suttaplex.blurb: A woman with five good qualities has a good rebirth.
